participant_1.name: Sophia Carter
participant_1.personality: Driven and ambitious, Sophia is passionate about gymnastics and inspiring others to pursue their dreams.
participant_1.background: i'm a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i workout four hours a day.

participant_2.name: Ethan Miller
participant_2.personality: Friendly and family-oriented, Ethan enjoys spending time with his siblings and trying out different cuisines.
participant_2.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i've one brother. i have three sisters.
